content:
TITLE: Cloning the TelDrive Repository
DESCRIPTION: Commands to clone the TelDrive repository from GitHub and navigate to the project directory. This is the first step in setting up the development environment.
SOURCE: https://github.com/tgdrive/teldrive/blob/main/CONTRIBUTING.md#2025-04-21_snippet_2

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
git clone https://github.com/tgdrive/teldrive.git
cd teldrive
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Installing TelDrive Dependencies
DESCRIPTION: Command to install all the dependencies required for TelDrive development using the Task runner.
SOURCE: https://github.com/tgdrive/teldrive/blob/main/CONTRIBUTING.md#2025-04-21_snippet_3

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
task deps
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Building TelDrive (Frontend and Backend)
DESCRIPTION: Command to build both the frontend and backend components of TelDrive. This is the default task that handles the complete build process.
SOURCE: https://github.com/tgdrive/teldrive/blob/main/CONTRIBUTING.md#2025-04-21_snippet_4

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
task
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Running the TelDrive Application
DESCRIPTION: Command to run the TelDrive application after building it. This launches the fully built application for testing and development.
SOURCE: https://github.com/tgdrive/teldrive/blob/main/CONTRIBUTING.md#2025-04-21_snippet_7

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
task run
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Building the TelDrive Backend
DESCRIPTION: Command to build only the backend server component of TelDrive without rebuilding the frontend.
SOURCE: https://github.com/tgdrive/teldrive/blob/main/CONTRIBUTING.md#2025-04-21_snippet_6

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
task server
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Setting Up the TelDrive Frontend
DESCRIPTION: Command to set up the TelDrive frontend. The frontend is managed in a separate repository but this command pulls the latest frontend release for development.
SOURCE: https://github.com/tgdrive/teldrive/blob/main/CONTRIBUTING.md#2025-04-21_snippet_5

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
task ui
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Installing Task on macOS/Linux using curl
DESCRIPTION: Command to install the Task task runner on macOS or Linux systems using curl. Task is a required prerequisite for building and running TelDrive.
SOURCE: https://github.com/tgdrive/teldrive/blob/main/CONTRIBUTING.md#2025-04-21_snippet_0

LANGUAGE: sh
CODE:
```
curl https://instl.vercel.app/go-task/task | bash
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Installing Task on Windows using PowerShell
DESCRIPTION: Command to install the Task task runner on Windows systems using PowerShell. This installs Task which is needed for building TelDrive on Windows platforms.
SOURCE: https://github.com/tgdrive/teldrive/blob/main/CONTRIBUTING.md#2025-04-21_snippet_1

LANGUAGE: powershell
CODE:
```
powershell -c "irm https://instl.vercel.app/go-task/task?platform=windows|iex"
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Generating the TelDrive API Specification
DESCRIPTION: Command to generate the API specification for TelDrive. This should be run during feature development to keep the API documentation updated.
SOURCE: https://github.com/tgdrive/teldrive/blob/main/CONTRIBUTING.md#2025-04-21_snippet_9

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
task gen
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Creating a Feature Branch in Git
DESCRIPTION: Command to create and switch to a new Git branch for feature development. This follows the project's branch naming convention for features.
SOURCE: https://github.com/tgdrive/teldrive/blob/main/CONTRIBUTING.md#2025-04-21_snippet_8

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
git checkout -b feature/your-feature-name
```
